import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Register extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { displayName: "", email: "", passOne: "", passTwo: "" } } handleChange(e) { const itemName = e.target.name; const itemValue = e.target.value; this.setState({itemName: itemValue}); console.log(this.state); } render() { return (

); } } export default Register;
